name: King Arthur: Fallen Champions
description: An all-new standalone expansion to the hit RPG-Strategy game!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2 or Vista or Windows7 Processor: AMD Athlon 4000+  or equivalent Intel CPU Memory: WinXP - 1Gbyte RAM, WinVista, Win7 – 1,5Gbyte RAM Hard Disk Space: 8 Gbyte Video Card: Nvidia 8600 GT (256Mbyte) / ATI Radeon HD3650 (256Mbyte) DirectX®: 9.0c or higher Sound: DirectX 9-compliant sound card Additional: 3-button mouse, keyboard and speakers
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2 or Vista or Windows7 Processor: AMD X2 6000+ or equivalent Intel CPU Memory: WinXP - 1,5Gbyte RAM, WinVista, Win7 - 2Gbyte RAM Hard Disk Space: 8 Gbyte Video Card: Nvidia 9800 GT 512MB or Ati 4850 512MB DirectX®: 9.0c or higher Sound: DirectX 9-compliant sound card Additional: 3-button mouse, keyboard and speakers

reviews.review_text: It is basically a chose your own adventure visual novel
